entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 06:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
